00019 #include "BonnMotionMobility.h"
00020 #include "BonnMotionFileCache.h"
00021 #include "FWMath.h"
00022 #include "FindModule.h"
00023 
00024 Define_Module(BonnMotionMobility);
00025 
00026 
00027 void BonnMotionMobility::initialize(int stage)
00028 {
00029     LineSegmentsMobilityBase::initialize(stage);
00030 
00031     debugEV << "initializing BonnMotionMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00032 
00033     if(stage == 0)
00034     {
00035         int nodeId = par("nodeId");
00036         if (nodeId == -1)
00037             nodeId = FindModule<>::findHost(this)->getIndex();
00038 
00039         const char*           fname  = par("traceFile");
00040         const BonnMotionFile *bmFile = BonnMotionFileCache::getInstance()->getFile(fname);
00041 
00042         vecp = bmFile->getLine(nodeId);
00043         if (!vecp)
00044             error("invalid nodeId %d -- no such line in file '%s'", nodeId, fname);
00045         vecpos = 0;
00046         bIs3D  = par("is3D").boolValue();
00047 
00048         if ((bIs3D && (vecp->size() % 4 != 0)) || (!bIs3D && (vecp->size() % 3 != 0)))
00049           opp_warning("nodeId %d -- missing bon-motion elements in '%s'", nodeId, fname);
00050 
00051         // obtain initial position
00052         const BonnMotionFile::Line& vec = *vecp;
00053         if (vec.size() >= (bIs3D ? 4 : 3)) {
00054           if (!bIs3D || world->use2D()) {
00055             move.setStart(Coord(vec[1], vec[2]), vec[0]);
00056           }
00057           else {
00058             move.setStart(Coord(vec[1], vec[2], vec[3]), vec[0]);
00059           }
00060       //vecpos += (bIs3D ? 4 : 3);
00061       targetPos  = move.getStartPos();
00062       targetTime = simTime();
00063       //stepTarget = move.startPos;
00064 
00065       //dummy value; speed not used in BonnMotion
00066       move.setSpeed(1);
00067       debugEV << "start pos: t=" << move.getStartTime() << move.getStartPos().info() << endl;
00068         }
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 BonnMotionMobility::~BonnMotionMobility()
00073 {
00074     BonnMotionFileCache::deleteInstance();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void BonnMotionMobility::setTargetPosition()
00078 {
00079     const BonnMotionFile::Line& vec = *vecp;
00080 
00081     if (vecpos+(bIs3D ? 3 : 2) >= vec.size())
00082     {
00083     move.setSpeed(0);
00084     debugEV << "host is stationary now!!!\n";
00085         return;
00086     }
00087 
00088     targetTime = vec[vecpos];
00089     targetPos.x = (vec[vecpos+1]);
00090     targetPos.y = (vec[vecpos+2]);
00091     if (bIs3D && !world->use2D())
00092         targetPos.z = (vec[vecpos+3]);
00093     vecpos    += (bIs3D ? 4 : 3);
00094 
00095     debugEV << "TARGET: t=" << targetTime << targetPos.info() << "\n";
00096 }
00097 
00098 void BonnMotionMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00099 {
00100     Coord dummy = Coord::ZERO;
00101     double dum;
00102 
00103     handleIfOutside( RAISEERROR, stepTarget, dummy, dummy, dum );
00104 }
